data.title: 'The Taliban Can't Win,' Says Commander Of U.S. Forces In Afghanistan
data.meta_description: In a wide-ranging interview, Gen. John W. Nicholson laid out some details of the new U.S. strategy in Afghanistan and explained how it will work. "We can move now in the right direction," he said.
